channel.title: Help! server problems
channel.description:
Please help me I get this error when i try to run my server:
Bad command or file name Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue . . . (Doing this just ends the program)
the file is runserver.bat from the Server subfoler in the CD folder of the Moparscape (i think) server and client.
please help or tell me of a server and client that I can run on Lan and make admins on easily!
I put the offending file in text format and uploaded it with the post

item.title: Help! server problems
item.dc:creator: @realityhole realityhole
item.description:
@realityhole wrote:

what do you mean try a new one?, get one from another site? if so do you know of any[br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2007, 08:00:39 AM[/size][hr]and if that doesn’t work does anybody know of any servers bundled with clients that I could run over LAN? that actually work?
and you can create Admins on easily?
and have commands to spawn items, etc?

Read full topic

item.title: Help! server problems
item.dc:creator: @r.v.d.p r.v.d.p
item.description:
@r.v.d.p wrote:

ok, try a new runserver.bat, if that doesn’t work your server is messed up
